isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CATERPILLAR C-10 AND C-12 ENGINES - OPERATION - Speedometer/Tachometer Connector

svcproc.title: Speedometer/Tachometer Connector
svcproc.para: Data link positive connector (427) terminal C is connected by circuit 47/48(+) to speedometer/tachometer connector (332) and (27). Data link positive connector (427) terminal A is connected by circuit 98A(+) to the ATA data link connector (68) terminal A. ATA data link connector (68) can be used to access information on the data link using an electronic service tool.

Data link negative connector (428) terminal C is connected by circuit 47/48(-) to speedometer/tachometer connector (332) and (27). Data link negative connector (428) terminal A is connected by circuit 98C(-) to the ATA data link connector (68) terminal B. ATA data link connector (68) can be used to access information on the data link using an electronic service tool.
